```{r Scenario comparison 1, echo=FALSE}

columns <- c("","Base Case", 
             "Scenario 1: Random death", 
             "Scenario 2: No treatment failure")

scenario_table_comparison <- setNames(data.frame(matrix(data = 0,
                                                       nrow = 5,
                                                       ncol = length(columns))), 
                                                              columns)

scenario_table_comparison[,1] <- c("Optimal individualized treament (a)",
                                   "Optimal uniform treatment strategy (b)",
                                   "ITR classification tree (c)",
                                   "Regret (a-c)",
                                   "EVIC (b-c)")

# Base Case
scenario_table_comparison[1,2] <- dec_rules[["comp_table"]]["OPTIMAL","NMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[2,2] <- dec_rules[["comp_table"]][dec_rules$opt_uniform,"NMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[3,2] <- dec_rules[["comp_table"]]["RECURSIVE_PARTITIONING","NMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[4,2] <- abs(scenario_table_comparison[1,2] - scenario_table_comparison[3,2]) 
scenario_table_comparison[5,2] <- abs(scenario_table_comparison[2,2] - scenario_table_comparison[3,2]) 
  
# Scenario 1
scenario_table_comparison[1,3] <- dec_rules_sc1[["comp_table"]]["OPTIMAL","NMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[2,3] <- dec_rules_sc1[["comp_table"]][dec_rules_sc1$opt_uniform,"NMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[3,3] <- dec_rules_sc1[["comp_table"]]["RECURSIVE_PARTITIONING","NMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[4,3] <- abs(scenario_table_comparison[1,3] - scenario_table_comparison[3,3]) 
scenario_table_comparison[5,3] <- abs(scenario_table_comparison[2,3] - scenario_table_comparison[3,3]) 

# Scenario 2
scenario_table_comparison[1,4] <- dec_rules_sc2[["comp_table"]]["OPTIMAL","NMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[2,4] <- dec_rules_sc1[["comp_table"]][dec_rules_sc2$opt_uniform,"NMB"]
scenario_table_comparison[3,4] <- dec_rules_sc2[["comp_table"]]["RECURSIVE_PARTITIONING","NMB"]  
scenario_table_comparison[4,4] <- abs(scenario_table_comparison[1,4] - scenario_table_comparison[2,4]) 
scenario_table_comparison[5,4] <- abs(scenario_table_comparison[2,4] - scenario_table_comparison[3,4])

# Output table
kbl(scenario_table_comparison, format = "simple", digits = 0, caption = "Comparison between base case and two scenarios in terms of Net Monetary Benefit regarding Regret and EVIC")

```
